Idea 1: Ticket Data Analysis for Customer Satisfaction
     * Analyze ticket data to identify patterns and trends in customer complaints and resolutions.
     * Use sentiment analysis to assess customer satisfaction levels based on ticket interactions.
     * Develop a predictive model to forecast potential customer dissatisfaction and proactively address issues.

Idea 2: Ticket Resolution Time Optimization
     * Investigate the factors affecting ticket resolution times using historical ticket data.
     * Implement machine learning algorithms to predict resolution times for new tickets.
     * Propose strategies to optimize resource allocation and reduce resolution times.

Idea 3: Anomaly Detection in Ticket Data
     * Utilize anomaly detection techniques to identify unusual patterns in ticket data.
     * Focus on detecting fraudulent activities or system failures that lead to abnormal ticket volumes.
     * Develop a real-time monitoring system to alert stakeholders of anomalies.

Idea 4: Ticket Categorization and Routing Enhancement
     * Analyze ticket data to improve the accuracy of ticket categorization and routing.
     * Implement natural language processing (NLP) techniques to automate ticket classification.
     * Evaluate the impact of improved categorization on resolution efficiency and customer satisfaction.

Idea 5: Impact of Ticket Volume on Support Team Performance
     * Study the relationship between ticket volume and support team performance metrics.
     * Identify thresholds where ticket volume negatively impacts performance.
     * Recommend workload balancing strategies to maintain high performance levels.
